languages.text: Attacking a familiar in melee returns {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% (no more that 100) of that damage as toxic damage to attacker.

traits.locale_text: Attacking a familiar in melee returns {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% (no more that 100) of that damage as toxic damage to attacker.

languages.text: If melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).
languages.original_text: Attacking a familiar in melee returns {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% (no more that 100) of that damage as toxic damage to attacker.

traits.locale_text: If a melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).

If melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).

If melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).

languages.text: ファミリアーが近接ダメージを受ける場合、攻撃側は与えたダメージの {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% に相当する {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g} を受ける（最大100%まで）。
languages.original_text: If melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: ファミリアーが近接ダメージを受ける場合、攻撃側は与えたダメージの {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% に相当する {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒ダメージ{/g} を受ける（最大100%まで）。

languages.text: Si le familier subit des dégâts de mêlée, l'assaillant se voit infliger un montant de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} égal à {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5} % des dégâts infligés (maximum 100 %).
languages.original_text: If melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: Si le familier subit des dégâts de mêlée, l'assaillant se voit infliger un montant de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g} égal à {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5} % des dégâts infligés (maximum 100 %).

languages.text: Si el familiar recibe daño cuerpo a cuerpo, el atacante sufre {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} igual al {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5} % del daño infligido (no puede ser superior al 100 %).
languages.original_text: If melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: Si el familiar recibe daño cuerpo a cuerpo, el atacante sufre {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g} igual al {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5} % del daño infligido (no puede ser superior al 100 %).

languages.text: 当使仆受到近战伤害时，攻击者会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}，等同于造成伤害的{uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}%（最高不能超过100%）。
languages.original_text: If melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: 当使仆受到近战伤害时，攻击者会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}，等同于造成伤害的{uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}%（最高不能超过100%）。

languages.text: Erleidet der Vertraute Nahkampfschaden, erleidet der Angreifer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} in Höhe von {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5} % des verursachten Schadens (max. 100 %).
languages.original_text: If melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: Erleidet der Vertraute Nahkampfschaden, erleidet der Angreifer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g} in Höhe von {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5} % des verursachten Schadens (max. 100 %).

languages.text: Saldırgan, iyeye yakın dövüş hasarı verdiğinde verdiği bu hasarın %{uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5} kadarı oranında {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: If melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: Saldırgan, iyeye yakın dövüş hasarı verdiğinde verdiği bu hasarın %{uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5} kadarı oranında {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasara{/g} maruz kalır.

languages.text: Если фамильяру наносят урон в ближнем бою, атакующий получает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}, равный {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% нанесенного урона (но не выше 100%).
languages.original_text: If melee damage is dealt to the familiar, the attacker suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} equal to {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% of the damage dealt (cannot be more than 100%).

traits.locale_text: Если фамильяру наносят урон в ближнем бою, атакующий получает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}, равный {uip|Reflec|9a3485e7900f43939a4e0afe883fb7d5}% нанесенного урона (но не выше 100%).
